tool_description: API provides a single API to read user-level and account-level customer data.
name: Personas
title: Personas

api_list.name: PersonasAPI
api_list.description: RapidAPI’s official API that allows you to add or update your API’s definition.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://personas.p.rapidapi.com/user/Chandu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "personas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://personas.p.rapidapi.com/user/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "personas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
